description: Limits controller in openstack API doesn't provide methods for some standard actions like other modules do. Other modules return "not implemented" fault instead on missing methods.
title: limits controller does not handle standard methods

comments.content: Limits controller in openstack API doesn't provide methods for some standard actions like other modules do. Other modules return "not implemented" fault instead on missing methods.
